description: This file contains helper functions and mock classes for widget testing in a Flutter project, including utility functions to wrap widgets with MaterialApp and pump them into a widget tester, as well as mock classes for testing external dependencies.

classes.name: MockApiClient
classes.description: A mock implementation of an API client for testing purposes using mocktail.

classes.name: FakeUri
classes.description: A fake class for Uri, used with mocktail to provide fallback values.

methods.name: wrapWithMaterialApp
methods.description: Wraps a widget with a MaterialApp and Scaffold for testing widget UI within a minimal app environment.

methods.name: pumpApp
methods.description: Pumps a widget into a WidgetTester wrapped with MaterialApp and Scaffold, then triggers a frame.

methods.name: registerFallbacks
methods.description: Registers fallback values for mocktail, specifically for Uri objects.
